sqlMap.select:
/* BookmarkMngSQL.xml > searchBookmarkList */ /*SELECT mypgm.dp_nm, mypgm.fol_flg, mypgm.pgm_no, mypgm.dp_seq, mypgm.prnt_pgm_no, pgm.pgm_nm, pgm.pgm_url, mypgm.usr_id FROM com_bookmark mypgm LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_pgm pgm ON mypgm.pgm_no = pgm.pgm_seq WHERE 1=1 AND mypgm.usr_id = 'usr_id' ORDER BY mnu_seq, srt_seq */
with pgm(srt_seq, mnu_seq1, mnu_seq2, pgm_no, dp_nm, pgm_url) as ( select row_number() over(order by t1.srt_seq, t2.srt_seq, pgm.srt_seq) srt_seq, t1.mnu_seq as mnu_seq1, t2.mnu_seq as mnu_seq2, mypgm.pgm_no, mypgm.dp_nm, pgm.pgm_url from tb_mnu as t1 join tb_mnu as t2 on t2.prnt_mnu_seq = t1.mnu_seq join tb_pgm as pgm on t2.mnu_seq = pgm.mnu_seq join com_bookmark as mypgm on pgm.pgm_seq = mypgm.pgm_no where mypgm.usr_id = #usr_id# and t1.prnt_mnu_seq is null )
select lvl, pgm_no, dp_nm, pgm_url from ( select '1' lvl, min(pgm.srt_seq) srt_seq, mnu1.mnu_seq pgm_no, mnu1.mnu_nm dp_nm, '' pgm_url from tb_mnu mnu1 join pgm on mnu1.mnu_seq = pgm.mnu_seq1 group by mnu1.mnu_seq, mnu1.mnu_nm
union all
select '2' lvl, min(pgm.srt_seq) srt_seq, mnu2.mnu_seq pgm_no, mnu2.mnu_nm dp_nm, '' pgm_url from tb_mnu mnu2 join pgm on mnu2.mnu_seq = pgm.mnu_seq2 group by mnu2.mnu_seq, mnu2.mnu_nm
union all
select '3' lvl, srt_seq, pgm_no, dp_nm, pgm_url from pgm ) inval
order by srt_seq, pgm_no
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO COM_BOOKMARK ( USR_ID, FOL_FLG, PGM_NO, DP_SEQ, DP_NM, PRNT_PGM_NO, CRE_DT, CRE_USR_ID, UPD_DT, UPD_USR_ID ) VALUES ( #usr_id#, 'N', #pgm_no#, (select ISNULL(max(dp_seq) +1,1) from com_bookmark where usr_id = #usr_id# and prnt_pgm_no = (select max(MNU_SEQ) from TB_PGM where PGM_SEQ = #pgm_no#)), #dp_nm#, (select max(MNU_SEQ) from TB_PGM where PGM_SEQ = #pgm_no#), getdate(), #usr_id#, getdate(), #usr_id# )
sqlMap.delete: DELETE COM_BOOKMARK WHERE usr_id = #usr_id# AND pgm_no = #pgm_no#
